Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: john dave
Reviews.Content: i"ve had this cell phone for a couple days now and ihave to say its a great product came new and unlocked  as expected fairly fast i have no complains i purchased mine from FGS Trading

Reviews.Title: Beast phone
Reviews.Author: Andrés Alizaga
Reviews.Content: This phone makes all other current flagships to look like stone age devices, no kidding.I thought it was going to feel a little bulky in the hand but it just feels so right, it's incredible how LG fit a 5.2 inch panel in such a comfortable package, weight feels great in hand and in the pocket.This is the first day i spend with the device and so far I'm very impressed: it's blazing fast, battery refuses to die and the interface while it seems a bit funky, with some minor tweaks it can look very good.The back buttons are a bit tricky at first but then it's just natural to have them there.I have to prove wrong some reviewers around the web that state the double knock feature is unpolished and does not work all the time. Let me tell you that in my experience the double knock works effortlessly. That topic is very subjective as people are used to different touch experiences across devices, but i truly believe the feature is very easy to use and adds lots of usability to the phone.purchased from FGS trading and it was very well packed, they were very polite and included an US wall charger adapter as the provided one if for Europe /Asia (not sure) excellent seller
